<li><i><a href="/wiki/Thriller_(album)" title="Thriller (album)">Thriller</a></i> (1982)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Bad_(album)" title="Bad (album)">Bad</a></i> (1987)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Dangerous_(Michael_Jackson_album)" title="Dangerous (Michael Jackson album)">Dangerous</a></i> (1991)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/HIStory:_Past,_Present_and_Future,_Book_I" title="HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I">HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I</a></i> (1995)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Invincible_(Michael_Jackson_album)" title="Invincible (Michael Jackson album)">Invincible</a></i> (2001)</li></ul>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Filmography">Filmography</span></h2>

<li><i><a href="/wiki/Moonwalker" title="Moonwalker">Moonwalker</a></i> (1988)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Michael_Jackson%27s_Ghosts" title="Michael Jackson's Ghosts">Michael Jackson's Ghosts</a></i> (1997)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Men_in_Black_II" title="Men in Black II">Men in Black II</a></i> (2002)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Miss_Cast_Away_and_the_Island_Girls" title="Miss Cast Away and the Island Girls">Miss Cast Away and the Island Girls</a></i> (2004)</li>

<link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1033289096" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="hatnote navigation-not-searchable" role="note">Main article: <a href="/wiki/List_of_concert_tours_by_Michael_Jackson_and_the_Jackson_5" title="List of concert tours by Michael Jackson and the Jackson 5">List of concert tours by Michael Jackson and the Jackson 5</a></div>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Notes">Notes</span></h2>
<style data-mw-deduplicate="TemplateStyles:r1011085734">.mw-parser-output .reflist{font-size:90%;margin-bottom:0.5em;list-style-type:decimal}.mw-parser-output .reflist .references{font-size:100%;margin-bottom:0;list-style-type:inherit}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-2{column-width:30em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns-3{column-width:25em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns{margin-top:0.3em}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns ol{margin-top:0}.mw-parser-output .reflist-columns li{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-alpha{list-style-type:upper-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-upper-roman{list-style-type:upper-roman}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-alpha{list-style-type:lower-alpha}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-greek{list-style-type:lower-greek}.mw-parser-output .reflist-lower-roman{list-style-type:lower-roman}</style><div class="reflist">
<div class="mw-references-wrap"><ol class="references">
<li id="cite_note-1"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-1">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">"<a href="/wiki/I_Just_Can%27t_Stop_Loving_You" title="I Just Can't Stop Loving You">I Just Can't Stop Loving You</a>", "<a href="/wiki/Bad_(Michael_Jackson_song)" title="Bad (Michael Jackson song)">Bad</a>", "<a href="/wiki/The_Way_You_Make_Me_Feel" title="The Way You Make Me Feel">The Way You Make Me Feel</a>", "<a href="/wiki/Man_in_the_Mirror" title="Man in the Mirror">Man in the Mirror</a>", and "<a href="/wiki/Dirty_Diana" title="Dirty Diana">Dirty Diana</a>".</span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-10"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-10">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">In 2006, <a href="/wiki/Raymone_Bain" title="Raymone Bain">Raymone Bain</a>, Jackson's publicist at that time, claimed that Michael Jackson had sold over 750 million units.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-2"><a href="#cite_note-2">[1]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-WSJ_3-0"><a href="#cite_note-WSJ-3">[2]</a></sup> Since 2006, several sources such as <i><a href="/wiki/Billboard_(magazine)" title="Billboard (magazine)">Billboard</a></i> or <a href="/wiki/Reuters" title="Reuters">Reuters</a> claimed that Michael Jackson had sold around 750 million records;<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-4"><a href="#cite_note-4">[3]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-5"><a href="#cite_note-5">[4]</a></sup> while others such as <a href="/wiki/MTV" title="MTV">MTV</a> or <a href="/wiki/CBS_News" title="CBS News">CBS News</a> claimed that his sales were over 750 million albums.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-6"><a href="#cite_note-6">[5]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-7"><a href="#cite_note-7">[6]</a></sup> In 2009, <i><a href="/wiki/The_Wall_Street_Journal" title="The Wall Street Journal">The Wall Street Journal</a></i> disputed the 750 million figure (if it referred to albums, instead of units).<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-WSJ_3-1"><a href="#cite_note-WSJ-3">[2]</a></sup> Later, in 2015, the <a href="/wiki/Recording_Industry_Association_of_America" title="Recording Industry Association of America">RIAA</a> stated that Michael Jackson has sold 1 billion records worldwide.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-RIAA_8-0"><a href="#cite_note-RIAA-8">[7]</a></sup><sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-9"><a href="#cite_note-9">[8]</a></sup></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-347"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-347">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">In 2018, its US sales record was overtaken by <a href="/wiki/Eagles_(band)" title="Eagles (band)">the Eagles</a>' album <i><a href="/wiki/Their_Greatest_Hits_(1971%E2%80%931975)" title="Their Greatest Hits (1971–1975)">Greatest Hits 1971–75</a>,</i> with 38× platinum.<sup class="reference" id="cite_ref-346"><a href="#cite_note-346">[344]</a></sup></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<li id="cite_note-allmusic-12"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-2"><sup><i><b>c</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-3"><sup><i><b>d</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-4"><sup><i><b>e</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-5"><sup><i><b>f</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-6"><sup><i><b>g</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-7"><sup><i><b>h</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-8"><sup><i><b>i</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-9"><sup><i><b>j</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-allmusic_12-10"><sup><i><b>k</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFHuey">Huey, Steve. <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150507080746/https://www.allmusic.com/artist/michael-jackson-mn0000467203/biography" rel="nofollow">"Michael Jackson – Artist Biography"</a>. <a href="/wiki/AllMusic" title="AllMusic">AllMusic</a>. <li id="cite_note-96"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-96">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20150509144426/https://www.aef.com/exhibits/social_responsibility/ad_council/2399/%3Apf_printable" rel="nofollow">"Drunk Driving Prevention (1983–Present)"</a>. Advertising Education Foundation. 2003. Archived from <a class="external text" href="https://www.aef.com/exhibits/social_responsibility/ad_council/2399/:pf_printable" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on May 9, 2015<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">May 31,</span> 2015</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=Drunk+Driving+Prevention+%281983%E2%80%93Present%29&amp;rft.pub=Advertising+Education+Foundation&amp;rft.date=2003&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aef.com%2Fexhibits%2Fsocial_responsibility%2Fad_council%2F2399%2F%3Apf_printable&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson"></span></span>
</li>

<li id="cite_note-137"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-137">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation magazine cs1" id="CITEREFJohnson1987">Johnson, Robert E. (September 1987). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=4Li0JBWU6E0C&amp;pg=PA143" rel="nofollow">"Michael Jackson Comes Back!"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Ebony_(magazine)" title="Ebony (magazine)">Ebony</a></i>. Vol. 42, no. 11. pp. 143, 148–9. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0012-9011" rel="nofollow">0012-9011</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Ebony&amp;rft.atitle=Michael+Jackson+Comes+Back%21&amp;rft.volume=42&amp;rft.issue=11&amp;rft.pages=143%2C+148-9&amp;rft.date=1987-09&amp;rft.issn=0012-9011&amp;rft.aulast=Johnson&amp;rft.aufirst=Robert+E.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3D4Li0JBWU6E0C%26pg%3DPA143&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-138"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-138">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation magazine cs1" id="CITEREFJackson1990">Jackson, Katherine (October 1990). <a class="external text" href="https://books.google.com/books?id=v9MDAAAAMBAJ&amp;pg=PA66" rel="nofollow">"Mother of Jackson Family Tells All"</a>. <i>Ebony</i>. Vol. 45, no. 12. p. 66. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/ISSN_(identifier)" title="ISSN (identifier)">ISSN</a> <a class="external text" href="//www.worldcat.org/issn/0012-9011" rel="nofollow">0012-9011</a>. <q>In 1987, he left the Jehovah's Witnesses. There was strong opposition to his "Thriller" video on the part of some Witnesses. Perhaps the controversy figured into his decision to leave. But I don't know that for a fact because I didn't talk to him about what he'd done. I couldn't. Witnesses do not discuss spiritual matters with a person who has disassociated himself from the Witnesses, including family members. But I want to stress that, contrary to published reports, I was not required to "shun" my son. Our relationship is as loving today as it was when he was a Witness. I just can't ask him, "Why, Michael?"</q></cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Ebony&amp;rft.atitle=Mother+of+Jackson+Family+Tells+All&amp;rft.volume=45&amp;rft.issue=12&amp;rft.pages=66&amp;rft.date=1990-10&amp;rft.issn=0012-9011&amp;rft.aulast=Jackson&amp;rft.aufirst=Katherine&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fbooks.google.com%2Fbooks%3Fid%3Dv9MDAAAAMBAJ%26pg%3DPA66&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-139"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-139">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation magazine cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://wol.jw.org/en/wol/d/r1/lp-e/101984368#h=18-20" rel="nofollow">"I Would Never Do It Again!"</a>. <i>Awake</i>. Jehovah's Witnesses. May 22, 1984. p. 20<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">September 11,</span> 2018</span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Awake&amp;rft.atitle=I+Would+Never+Do+It+Again%21&amp;rft.pages=20&amp;rft.date=1984-05-22&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwol.jw.org%2Fen%2Fwol%2Fd%2Fr1%2Flp-e%2F101984368%23h%3D18-20&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson"></span></span>

<li id="cite_note-156"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-156">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20190407112354/https://www.deseretnews.com/article/33490/ENTERTAINMENT-NOTES-MOONWALKER-TOPS-THRILLER.html" rel="nofollow">"Entertainment Notes: Moonwalker Tops Thriller"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Deseret_News" title="Deseret News">Deseret News</a></i>. February 6, 1989. Archived from <a class="external text" href="https://www.deseretnews.com/article/33490/ENTERTAINMENT-NOTES-MOONWALKER-TOPS-THRILLER.html" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on April 7, 2019<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-billboard_mj-175"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-billboard_mj_175-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-billboard_mj_175-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation magazine cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://www.billboard.com/artist/michael-jackson/chart-history/hsi/" rel="nofollow">"Michael Jackson Chart History"</a>. <i>Billboard</i>. <li id="cite_note-Abuse-193"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Abuse_193-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation news cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://news.bbc.co.uk/onthisday/hi/dates/stories/august/24/newsid_2512000/2512077.stm" rel="nofollow">"1993: Michael Jackson accused of child abuse"</a>. <i>BBC News</i>. <li id="cite_note-214"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-214">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20110120062601/http://www.oprah.com/oprahshow/Lisa-Marie-Presley-Opens-Up-About-Michael-Jackson/print/1" rel="nofollow">"Lisa Marie Presley Opens Up About Michael Jackson - Oprah.com"</a>. January 20, 2011. Archived from <a class="external text" href="http://www.oprah.com/oprahshow/Lisa-Marie-Presley-Opens-Up-About-Michael-Jackson/print/1" rel="nofollow">the original</a> on January 20, 2011<span class="reference-accessdate">. <li id="cite_note-Jackson_Lee-421"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-Jackson_Lee_421-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFJackson-Lee2009">Jackson-Lee, Sheila (June 26, 2009). <a class="external text" href="https://www.congress.gov/bill/111th-congress/house-resolution/600/text" rel="nofollow">"H. <li id="cite_note-423"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-423">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">Joseph Vogel, <a class="external text" href="https://www.huffpost.com/entry/michael-jacksons-forgotten-humanitarian-legacy_b_59c7c8d3e4b08d661550436a" rel="nofollow">Michael Jackson's Forgotten Humanitarian Legacy</a>, <i>HuffPost</i> (September 24, 2017).</span>

<li id="cite_note-AMHIStory-465"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-AMHIStory_465-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-AMHIStory_465-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation web cs1" id="CITEREFErlewine">Erlewine, Stephen Thomas. <a class="external text" href="https://www.allmusic.com/album/history-past-present-and-future-book-i-mw0000123992" rel="nofollow">"Michael Jackson – HIStory – Overview"</a>. (2010). <a class="external text" href="https://www.jpanafrican.org/docs/vol3no7/3.7MJ-Wanna-3.pdf" rel="nofollow">"Wanna Be Startin' Somethin': MJ in the Scholarly Literature: A Selected Bibliographic Guide"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. <i><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/The_Journal_of_Pan_African_Studies" title="The Journal of Pan African Studies">The Journal of Pan African Studies</a></i>. <b>3</b> (7).</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=The+Journal+of+Pan+African+Studies&amp;rft.atitle=Wanna+Be+Startin%27+Somethin%27%3A+MJ+in+the+Scholarly+Literature%3A+A+Selected+Bibliographic+Guide&amp;rft.volume=3&amp;rft.issue=7&amp;rft.date=2010&amp;rft.aulast=Hidalgo&amp;rft.aufirst=Susan&amp;rft.au=Weiner%2C+Robert+G.&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jpanafrican.org%2Fdocs%2Fvol3no7%2F3.7MJ-Wanna-3.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AMichael+Jackson"></span></li></ul>

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Awards_for_Michael_Jackson" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#e8e8ff;"><div id="Awards_for_Michael_Jackson" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/List_of_awards_and_nominations_received_by_Michael_Jackson" title="List of awards and nominations received by Michael Jackson">Awards for Michael Jackson</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0;font-size:114%"><div style="padding:0px">
<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Pop/Rock_Male_Artist" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Pop/Rock_Male_Artist" title="Template:American Music Award for Favorite Pop/Rock Male Artist"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Pop/Rock_Male_Artist" title="Template talk:American Music Award for Favorite Pop/Rock Male Artist"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Pop/Rock_Male_Artist&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Pop/Rock_Male_Artist" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Pop/Rock_Male_Artist" title="American Music Award for Favorite Pop/Rock Male Artist">American Music Award for Favorite Pop/Rock Male Artist</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<li><a href="/wiki/Post_Malone" title="Post Malone">Post Malone</a> (2018)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Khalid_(singer)" title="Khalid (singer)">Khalid</a> (2019)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Justin_Bieber" title="Justin Bieber">Justin Bieber</a> (2020)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Ed_Sheeran" title="Ed Sheeran">Ed Sheeran</a> (2021)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Soul/R&amp;amp;B_Male_Artist" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Soul/R%26B_Male_Artist" title="Template:American Music Award for Favorite Soul/R&amp;B Male Artist"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Soul/R%26B_Male_Artist" title="Template talk:American Music Award for Favorite Soul/R&amp;B Male Artist"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Soul/R%26B_Male_Artist&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Soul/R&amp;amp;B_Male_Artist" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/American_Music_Award_for_Favorite_Soul/R%26B_Male_Artist" title="American Music Award for Favorite Soul/R&amp;B Male Artist">American Music Award for Favorite Soul/R&amp;B Male Artist</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="American_Music_Award_of_Merit" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:American_Music_Award_of_Merit" title="Template:American Music Award of Merit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:American_Music_Award_of_Merit" title="Template talk:American Music Award of Merit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:American_Music_Award_of_Merit&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="American_Music_Award_of_Merit" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/American_Music_Award_of_Merit" title="American Music Award of Merit">American Music Award of Merit</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Billboard_Year-End_Top_Artist" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Billboard_Year-End_Top_Artists" title="Template:Billboard Year-End Top Artists"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Billboard_Year-End_Top_Artists" title="Template talk:Billboard Year-End Top Artists"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Billboard_Year-End_Top_Artists&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Billboard_Year-End_Top_Artist" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Billboard_Year-End" title="Billboard Year-End"><i>Billboard</i> Year-End</a> Top Artist</div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">1981–1999</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">1981: <a href="/wiki/REO_Speedwagon" title="REO Speedwagon">REO Speedwagon</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1991: <a href="/wiki/Mariah_Carey" title="Mariah Carey">Mariah Carey</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1992: <a href="/wiki/Garth_Brooks" title="Garth Brooks">Garth Brooks</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1993: <a href="/wiki/Garth_Brooks" title="Garth Brooks">Garth Brooks</a></span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">1994: <a href="/wiki/Ace_of_Base" title="Ace of Base">Ace of Base</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1996: <a href="/wiki/Alanis_Morissette" title="Alanis Morissette">Alanis Morissette</a></span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap">1999: <a href="/wiki/Backstreet_Boys" title="Backstreet Boys">Backstreet Boys</a></span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">2000–2019</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Brit_Award_for_British_Album_of_the_Year" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Brit_British_Album" title="Template:Brit British Album"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Brit_British_Album" title="Template talk:Brit British Album"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Brit_British_Album&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Brit_Award_for_British_Album_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Brit_Award_for_British_Album_of_the_Year" title="Brit Award for British Album of the Year">Brit Award for British Album of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">1977–2000</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Sgt._Pepper%27s_Lonely_Hearts_Club_Band" title="Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band">Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/The_Beatles" title="The Beatles">The Beatles</a> (1977)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Kings_of_the_Wild_Frontier" title="Kings of the Wild Frontier">Kings of the Wild Frontier</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Adam_and_the_Ants" title="Adam and the Ants">Adam and the Ants</a> (1982)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Memories_(Barbra_Streisand_album)" title="Memories (Barbra Streisand album)">Memories</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Barbra_Streisand" title="Barbra Streisand">Barbra Streisand</a> (1983)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Thriller_(album)" title="Thriller (album)">Thriller</a></i> – <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Michael Jackson</a> (1984)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Diamond_Life" title="Diamond Life">Diamond Life</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Sade_(band)" title="Sade (band)">Sade</a> (1985)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/No_Jacket_Required" title="No Jacket Required">No Jacket Required</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Phil_Collins" title="Phil Collins">Phil Collins</a> (1986)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Brothers_in_Arms_(album)" title="Brothers in Arms (album)">Brothers in Arms</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Dire_Straits" title="Dire Straits">Dire Straits</a> (1987)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/...Nothing_Like_the_Sun" title="...Nothing Like the Sun">...Nothing Like the Sun</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Sting_(musician)" title="Sting (musician)">Sting</a> (1988)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/The_First_of_a_Million_Kisses" title="The First of a Million Kisses">The First of a Million Kisses</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Fairground_Attraction" title="Fairground Attraction">Fairground Attraction</a> (1989)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/The_Raw_%26_the_Cooked_(album)" title="The Raw &amp; the Cooked (album)">The Raw and the Cooked</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Fine_Young_Cannibals" title="Fine Young Cannibals">Fine Young Cannibals</a> (1990)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Listen_Without_Prejudice_Vol._1" title="Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1">Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/George_Michael" title="George Michael">George Michael</a> (1991)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Seal_(1991_album)" title="Seal (1991 album)">Seal</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Seal_(musician)" title="Seal (musician)">Seal</a> (1992)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Diva_(Annie_Lennox_album)" title="Diva (Annie Lennox album)">Diva</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Annie_Lennox" title="Annie Lennox">Annie Lennox</a> (1993)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Connected_(Stereo_MC%27s_album)" title="Connected (Stereo MC's album)">Connected</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Stereo_MC%27s" title="Stereo MC's">Stereo MC's</a> (1994)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Parklife" title="Parklife">Parklife</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Blur_(band)" title="Blur (band)">Blur</a> (1995)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/(What%27s_the_Story)_Morning_Glory%3F" title="(What's the Story) Morning Glory?">(What's the Story) Morning Glory?</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Oasis_(band)" title="Oasis (band)">Oasis</a> (1996)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Everything_Must_Go_(Manic_Street_Preachers_album)" title="Everything Must Go (Manic Street Preachers album)">Everything Must Go</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Manic_Street_Preachers" title="Manic Street Preachers">Manic Street Preachers</a> (1997)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Urban_Hymns" title="Urban Hymns">Urban Hymns</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/The_Verve" title="The Verve">The Verve</a> (1998)</li>

<li><i><a href="/wiki/The_Man_Who" title="The Man Who">The Man Who</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Travis_(band)" title="Travis (band)">Travis</a> (2000)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">2001–present</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Brit_Award_for_International_Male_Solo_Artist" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Brit_International_Male" title="Template:Brit International Male"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Brit_International_Male" title="Template talk:Brit International Male"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Brit_International_Male&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Brit_Award_for_International_Male_Solo_Artist" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Brit_Award_for_International_Male_Solo_Artist" title="Brit Award for International Male Solo Artist">Brit Award for International Male Solo Artist</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Award_for_Album_of_the_Year" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Award_for_Album_of_the_Year" title="Template:Grammy Award for Album of the Year"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Award_for_Album_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Grammy Award for Album of the Year"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Award_for_Album_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Award_for_Album_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Album_of_the_Year" title="Grammy Award for Album of the Year">Grammy Award for Album of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1959–1979</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Music_from_Peter_Gunn" title="The Music from Peter Gunn">The Music from Peter Gunn</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Henry_Mancini" title="Henry Mancini">Henry Mancini</a> (1959)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Come_Dance_with_Me!_(album)" title="Come Dance with Me! (album)">Come Dance with Me!</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sinatra" title="Frank Sinatra">Frank Sinatra</a> (1960)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Button-Down_Mind_of_Bob_Newhart" title="The Button-Down Mind of Bob Newhart">The Button-Down Mind of Bob Newhart</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Bob_Newhart" title="Bob Newhart">Bob Newhart</a> (1961)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Judy_at_Carnegie_Hall" title="Judy at Carnegie Hall">Judy at Carnegie Hall</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Judy_Garland" title="Judy Garland">Judy Garland</a> (1962)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_First_Family_(album)" title="The First Family (album)">The First Family</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Vaughn_Meader" title="Vaughn Meader">Vaughn Meader</a> (1963)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Barbra_Streisand_Album" title="The Barbra Streisand Album">The Barbra Streisand Album</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Barbra_Streisand" title="Barbra Streisand">Barbra Streisand</a> (1964)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Getz/Gilberto" title="Getz/Gilberto">Getz/Gilberto</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Stan_Getz" title="Stan Getz">Stan Getz</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jo%C3%A3o_Gilberto" title="João Gilberto">João Gilberto</a> (1965)</span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/A_Man_and_His_Music" title="A Man and His Music">A Man and His Music</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sinatra" title="Frank Sinatra">Frank Sinatra</a> (1967)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Sgt._Pepper%27s_Lonely_Hearts_Club_Band" title="Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band">Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/The_Beatles" title="The Beatles">The Beatles</a> (1968)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/By_the_Time_I_Get_to_Phoenix_(Glen_Campbell_album)" title="By the Time I Get to Phoenix (Glen Campbell album)">By the Time I Get to Phoenix</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Glen_Campbell" title="Glen Campbell">Glen Campbell</a> (1969)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Blood,_Sweat_%26_Tears_(Blood,_Sweat_%26_Tears_album)" title="Blood, Sweat &amp; Tears (Blood, Sweat &amp; Tears album)">Blood, Sweat &amp; Tears</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Blood,_Sweat_%26_Tears" title="Blood, Sweat &amp; Tears">Blood, Sweat &amp; Tears</a> (1970)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Bridge_over_Troubled_Water" title="Bridge over Troubled Water">Bridge over Troubled Water</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Simon_%26_Garfunkel" title="Simon &amp; Garfunkel">Simon &amp; Garfunkel</a> (1971)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Tapestry_(Carole_King_album)" title="Tapestry (Carole King album)">Tapestry</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Carole_King" title="Carole King">Carole King</a> (1972)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Concert_for_Bangladesh_(album)" title="The Concert for Bangladesh (album)">The Concert for Bangladesh</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/George_Harrison" title="George Harrison">George Harrison</a> &amp; Friends (1973)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Innervisions" title="Innervisions">Innervisions</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Stevie_Wonder" title="Stevie Wonder">Stevie Wonder</a> (1974)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Fulfillingness%27_First_Finale" title="Fulfillingness' First Finale">Fulfillingness' First Finale</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Stevie_Wonder" title="Stevie Wonder">Stevie Wonder</a> (1975)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Still_Crazy_After_All_These_Years" title="Still Crazy After All These Years">Still Crazy After All These Years</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Paul_Simon" title="Paul Simon">Paul Simon</a> (1976)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Songs_in_the_Key_of_Life" title="Songs in the Key of Life">Songs in the Key of Life</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Stevie_Wonder" title="Stevie Wonder">Stevie Wonder</a> (1977)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Rumours_(album)" title="Rumours (album)">Rumours</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Fleetwood_Mac" title="Fleetwood Mac">Fleetwood Mac</a> (1978)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Saturday_Night_Fever_(soundtrack)" title="Saturday Night Fever (soundtrack)">Saturday Night Fever</a></i> – Various Artists (1979)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1980–1999</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/52nd_Street_(album)" title="52nd Street (album)">52nd Street</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Billy_Joel" title="Billy Joel">Billy Joel</a> (1980)</span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Unforgettable..._with_Love" title="Unforgettable... with Love">Unforgettable... with Love</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Natalie_Cole" title="Natalie Cole">Natalie Cole</a> (1992)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Unplugged_(Eric_Clapton_album)" title="Unplugged (Eric Clapton album)">Unplugged</a></i>  – <a href="/wiki/Eric_Clapton" title="Eric Clapton">Eric Clapton</a> (1993)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Bodyguard_(soundtrack)" title="The Bodyguard (soundtrack)">The Bodyguard</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Whitney_Houston" title="Whitney Houston">Whitney Houston</a> (1994)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/MTV_Unplugged_(Tony_Bennett_album)" title="MTV Unplugged (Tony Bennett album)">MTV Unplugged</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Tony_Bennett" title="Tony Bennett">Tony Bennett</a> (1995)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Jagged_Little_Pill" title="Jagged Little Pill">Jagged Little Pill</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Alanis_Morissette" title="Alanis Morissette">Alanis Morissette</a> (1996)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Falling_into_You" title="Falling into You">Falling into You</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Celine_Dion" title="Celine Dion">Celine Dion</a> (1997)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Time_Out_of_Mind_(Bob_Dylan_album)" title="Time Out of Mind (Bob Dylan album)">Time Out of Mind</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Bob_Dylan" title="Bob Dylan">Bob Dylan</a> (1998)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Miseducation_of_Lauryn_Hill" title="The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill">The Miseducation of Lauryn Hill</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Lauryn_Hill" title="Lauryn Hill">Lauryn Hill</a> (1999)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">2000–2019</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Supernatural_(Santana_album)" title="Supernatural (Santana album)">Supernatural</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Santana_(band)" title="Santana (band)">Santana</a> (2000)</span></li>

<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/21_(Adele_album)" title="21 (Adele album)">21</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Adele" title="Adele">Adele</a> (2012)</span></li>

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Award_for_Record_of_the_Year" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Award_for_Record_of_the_Year" title="Template:Grammy Award for Record of the Year"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Award_for_Record_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Grammy Award for Record of the Year"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Award_for_Record_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Award_for_Record_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Record_of_the_Year" title="Grammy Award for Record of the Year">Grammy Award for Record of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1959−1980</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Nel_blu,_dipinto_di_blu_(song)" title="Nel blu, dipinto di blu (song)">Nel Blu Dipinto Di Blu (Volare)</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Domenico_Modugno" title="Domenico Modugno">Domenico Modugno</a> (1959)</li>

<li>"<a href="/wiki/Days_of_Wine_and_Roses_(song)" title="Days of Wine and Roses (song)">Days of Wine and Roses</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Henry_Mancini" title="Henry Mancini">Henry Mancini</a> (1964)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/The_Girl_from_Ipanema" title="The Girl from Ipanema">The Girl from Ipanema</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Astrud_Gilberto" title="Astrud Gilberto">Astrud Gilberto</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Stan_Getz" title="Stan Getz">Stan Getz</a> (1965)</li>

<li>"<a href="/wiki/Strangers_in_the_Night" title="Strangers in the Night">Strangers in the Night</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sinatra" title="Frank Sinatra">Frank Sinatra</a> (1967)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Up,_Up_and_Away_(song)" title="Up, Up and Away (song)">Up, Up and Away</a>" by <a href="/wiki/The_5th_Dimension" title="The 5th Dimension">The 5th Dimension</a> (<a href="/wiki/Billy_Davis_Jr." title="Billy Davis Jr.">Billy Davis Jr.</a>, <a href="/wiki/Florence_LaRue" title="Florence LaRue">Florence LaRue</a>, <a href="/wiki/Marilyn_McCoo" title="Marilyn McCoo">Marilyn McCoo</a>, <a href="/wiki/Lamonte_McLemore" title="Lamonte McLemore">Lamonte McLemore</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Townson" title="Ronald Townson">Ron Townson</a>) (1968)</li>

<li>"<a href="/wiki/Aquarius/Let_the_Sunshine_In" title="Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In">Aquarius/Let the Sunshine In</a>" by <a href="/wiki/The_5th_Dimension" title="The 5th Dimension">The 5th Dimension</a> (<a href="/wiki/Billy_Davis_Jr." title="Billy Davis Jr.">Billy Davis Jr.</a>, <a href="/wiki/Florence_LaRue" title="Florence LaRue">Florence LaRue</a>, <a href="/wiki/Marilyn_McCoo" title="Marilyn McCoo">Marilyn McCoo</a>, <a href="/wiki/Lamonte_McLemore" title="Lamonte McLemore">Lamonte McLemore</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Townson" title="Ronald Townson">Ron Townson</a>) (1970)</li>

<li>"<a href="/wiki/Love_Will_Keep_Us_Together" title="Love Will Keep Us Together">Love Will Keep Us Together</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Captain_%26_Tennille" title="Captain &amp; Tennille">Captain &amp; Tennille</a> (<a href="/wiki/Daryl_Dragon" title="Daryl Dragon">Daryl Dragon</a>, <a href="/wiki/Toni_Tennille" title="Toni Tennille">Toni Tennille</a>) (1976)</li>
