</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">2001−2020</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Beautiful_Day" title="Beautiful Day">Beautiful Day</a>" by <a href="/wiki/U2" title="U2">U2</a> (<a href="/wiki/Bono" title="Bono">Bono</a>, <a href="/wiki/Adam_Clayton" title="Adam Clayton">Adam Clayton</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Edge" title="The Edge">The Edge</a>, <a href="/wiki/Larry_Mullen_Jr." title="Larry Mullen Jr.">Larry Mullen Jr.</a>) (2001)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Walk_On_(U2_song)" title="Walk On (U2 song)">Walk On</a>" by <a href="/wiki/U2" title="U2">U2</a> (<a href="/wiki/Bono" title="Bono">Bono</a>, <a href="/wiki/Adam_Clayton" title="Adam Clayton">Adam Clayton</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Edge" title="The Edge">The Edge</a>, <a href="/wiki/Larry_Mullen_Jr." title="Larry Mullen Jr.">Larry Mullen Jr.</a>) (2002)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Don%27t_Know_Why" title="Don't Know Why">Don't Know Why</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Norah_Jones" title="Norah Jones">Norah Jones</a> (2003)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Clocks_(song)" title="Clocks (song)">Clocks</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Coldplay" title="Coldplay">Coldplay</a> (<a href="/wiki/Guy_Berryman" title="Guy Berryman">Guy Berryman</a>, <a href="/wiki/Jonny_Buckland" title="Jonny Buckland">Jon Buckland</a>, <a href="/wiki/Will_Champion" title="Will Champion">Will Champion</a>, <a href="/wiki/Phil_Harvey_(manager)" title="Phil Harvey (manager)">Phil Harvey</a>, <a href="/wiki/Chris_Martin" title="Chris Martin">Chris Martin</a>) (2004)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Here_We_Go_Again_(Ray_Charles_song)" title="Here We Go Again (Ray Charles song)">Here We Go Again</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Ray_Charles" title="Ray Charles">Ray Charles</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Norah_Jones" title="Norah Jones">Norah Jones</a> (2005)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Boulevard_of_Broken_Dreams_(Green_Day_song)" title="Boulevard of Broken Dreams (Green Day song)">Boulevard of Broken Dreams</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Green_Day" title="Green Day">Green Day</a> (<a href="/wiki/Billie_Joe_Armstrong" title="Billie Joe Armstrong">Billie Joe Armstrong</a>, <a href="/wiki/Mike_Dirnt" title="Mike Dirnt">Mike Dirnt</a>, <a href="/wiki/Tr%C3%A9_Cool" title="Tré Cool">Frank Edwin Wright III</a>) (2006)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Not_Ready_to_Make_Nice" title="Not Ready to Make Nice">Not Ready to Make Nice</a>" by <a href="/wiki/The_Chicks" title="The Chicks">Dixie Chicks</a> (<a href="/wiki/Martie_Maguire" title="Martie Maguire">Martie Maguire</a>, <a href="/wiki/Natalie_Maines" title="Natalie Maines">Natalie Maines</a>, <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Emily_Robison" title="Emily Robison">Emily Robison</a>) (2007)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Rehab_(Amy_Winehouse_song)" title="Rehab (Amy Winehouse song)">Rehab</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Amy_Winehouse" title="Amy Winehouse">Amy Winehouse</a> (2008)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Please_Read_the_Letter" title="Please Read the Letter">Please Read the Letter</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Alison_Krauss" title="Alison Krauss">Alison Krauss</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Robert_Plant" title="Robert Plant">Robert Plant</a> (2009)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Use_Somebody" title="Use Somebody">Use Somebody</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Kings_of_Leon" title="Kings of Leon">Kings of Leon</a> (<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Caleb_Followill" title="Caleb Followill">Caleb Followill</a>, <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Jared_Followill" title="Jared Followill">Jared Followill</a>, <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Matthew_Followill" title="Matthew Followill">Matthew Followill</a>, <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Nathan_Followill" title="Nathan Followill">Nathan Followill</a>) (2010)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Need_You_Now_(Lady_Antebellum_song)" title="Need You Now (Lady Antebellum song)">Need You Now</a>" by <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Lady_Antebellum" title="Lady Antebellum">Lady Antebellum</a> (<a href="/wiki/Hillary_Scott" title="Hillary Scott">Hillary Scott</a>, <a href="/wiki/Charles_Kelley" title="Charles Kelley">Charles Kelley</a>, <a href="/wiki/Dave_Haywood" title="Dave Haywood">Dave Haywood</a>) (2011)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Rolling_in_the_Deep" title="Rolling in the Deep">Rolling in the Deep</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Adele" title="Adele">Adele</a> (2012)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Somebody_That_I_Used_to_Know" title="Somebody That I Used to Know">Somebody That I Used to Know</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Gotye" title="Gotye">Gotye</a> featuring <a href="/wiki/Kimbra" title="Kimbra">Kimbra</a> (2013)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Get_Lucky_(Daft_Punk_song)" title="Get Lucky (Daft Punk song)">Get Lucky</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Daft_Punk" title="Daft Punk">Daft Punk</a> (<a href="/wiki/Thomas_Bangalter" title="Thomas Bangalter">Thomas Bangalter</a>, <a href="/wiki/Guy-Manuel_de_Homem-Christo" title="Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo">Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo</a>) featuring <a href="/wiki/Pharrell_Williams" title="Pharrell Williams">Pharrell Williams</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Nile_Rodgers" title="Nile Rodgers">Nile Rodgers</a> (2014)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Stay_with_Me_(Sam_Smith_song)" title="Stay with Me (Sam Smith song)">Stay with Me</a>" (<a href="/wiki/Rodney_Jerkins" title="Rodney Jerkins">Darkchild</a> version) by <a href="/wiki/Sam_Smith" title="Sam Smith">Sam Smith</a> (2015)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Uptown_Funk" title="Uptown Funk">Uptown Funk</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Mark_Ronson" title="Mark Ronson">Mark Ronson</a> featuring <a href="/wiki/Bruno_Mars" title="Bruno Mars">Bruno Mars</a> (2016)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Hello_(Adele_song)" title="Hello (Adele song)">Hello</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Adele" title="Adele">Adele</a> (2017)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/24K_Magic_(song)" title="24K Magic (song)">24K Magic</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Bruno_Mars" title="Bruno Mars">Bruno Mars</a> (2018)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/This_Is_America_(song)" title="This Is America (song)">This Is America</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Donald_Glover" title="Donald Glover">Childish Gambino</a> (2019)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Bad_Guy_(Billie_Eilish_song)" title="Bad Guy (Billie Eilish song)">Bad Guy</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Billie_Eilish" title="Billie Eilish">Billie Eilish</a> (2020)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">2021−present</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Everything_I_Wanted" title="Everything I Wanted">Everything I Wanted</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Billie_Eilish" title="Billie Eilish">Billie Eilish</a> (2021)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Leave_the_Door_Open" title="Leave the Door Open">Leave the Door Open</a>" by <a href="/wiki/Silk_Sonic" title="Silk Sonic">Silk Sonic</a> (2022)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Award_for_Song_of_the_Year" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Award_for_Song_of_the_Year" title="Template:Grammy Award for Song of the Year"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Award_for_Song_of_the_Year" title="Template talk:Grammy Award for Song of the Year"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Award_for_Song_of_the_Year&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Award_for_Song_of_the_Year" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Song_of_the_Year" title="Grammy Award for Song of the Year">Grammy Award for Song of the Year</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1959−1980</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Nel_blu,_dipinto_di_blu_(song)" title="Nel blu, dipinto di blu (song)">Nel blu, dipinto di blu (Volare)</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Domenico_Modugno" title="Domenico Modugno">Domenico Modugno</a> (songwriter) (1959)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/The_Battle_of_New_Orleans" title="The Battle of New Orleans">The Battle of New Orleans</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jimmy_Driftwood" title="Jimmy Driftwood">Jimmy Driftwood</a> (songwriter) (1960)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Theme_of_Exodus" title="Theme of Exodus">Theme of <i>Exodus</i></a>" – <a href="/wiki/Ernest_Gold_(composer)" title="Ernest Gold (composer)">Ernest Gold</a> (songwriter) (1961)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Moon_River" title="Moon River">Moon River</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Johnny_Mercer" title="Johnny Mercer">Johnny Mercer</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Henry_Mancini" title="Henry Mancini">Henry Mancini</a> (songwriters) (1962)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/What_Kind_of_Fool_Am_I%3F" title="What Kind of Fool Am I?">What Kind of Fool Am I?</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Leslie_Bricusse" title="Leslie Bricusse">Leslie Bricusse</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Anthony_Newley" title="Anthony Newley">Anthony Newley</a> (songwriters) (1963)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Days_of_Wine_and_Roses_(song)" title="Days of Wine and Roses (song)">Days of Wine and Roses</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Johnny_Mercer" title="Johnny Mercer">Johnny Mercer</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Henry_Mancini" title="Henry Mancini">Henry Mancini</a> (songwriters) (1964)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Hello,_Dolly!_(song)" title="Hello, Dolly! (song)">Hello, Dolly!</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jerry_Herman" title="Jerry Herman">Jerry Herman</a> (songwriter) (1965)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/The_Shadow_of_Your_Smile" title="The Shadow of Your Smile">The Shadow of Your Smile</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Paul_Francis_Webster" title="Paul Francis Webster">Paul Francis Webster</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Johnny_Mandel" title="Johnny Mandel">Johnny Mandel</a> (songwriters) (1966)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Michelle_(song)" title="Michelle (song)">Michelle</a>" – <a href="/wiki/John_Lennon" title="John Lennon">John Lennon</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Paul_McCartney" title="Paul McCartney">Paul McCartney</a> (songwriters) (1967)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Up,_Up_and_Away_(song)" title="Up, Up and Away (song)">Up, Up, and Away</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jimmy_Webb" title="Jimmy Webb">Jimmy Webb</a> (songwriter) (1968)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Little_Green_Apples" title="Little Green Apples">Little Green Apples</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Bobby_Russell" title="Bobby Russell">Bobby Russell</a> (songwriter) (1969)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Games_People_Play_(Joe_South_song)" title="Games People Play (Joe South song)">Games People Play</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Joe_South" title="Joe South">Joe South</a> (songwriter) (1970)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Bridge_over_Troubled_Water_(song)" title="Bridge over Troubled Water (song)">Bridge over Troubled Water</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Paul_Simon" title="Paul Simon">Paul Simon</a> (songwriter) (1971)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/You%27ve_Got_a_Friend" title="You've Got a Friend">You've Got a Friend</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Carole_King" title="Carole King">Carole King</a> (songwriter) (1972)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/The_First_Time_Ever_I_Saw_Your_Face" title="The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face">The First Time Ever I Saw Your Face</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Ewan_MacColl" title="Ewan MacColl">Ewan MacColl</a> (songwriter) (1973)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Killing_Me_Softly_with_His_Song" title="Killing Me Softly with His Song">Killing Me Softly with His Song</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Norman_Gimbel" title="Norman Gimbel">Norman Gimbel</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Charles_Fox_(composer)" title="Charles Fox (composer)">Charles Fox</a> (songwriters) (1974)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/The_Way_We_Were_(song)" title="The Way We Were (song)">The Way We Were</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Alan_and_Marilyn_Bergman" title="Alan and Marilyn Bergman">Alan and Marilyn Bergman</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Marvin_Hamlisch" title="Marvin Hamlisch">Marvin Hamlisch</a> (songwriters) (1975)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Send_In_the_Clowns" title="Send In the Clowns">Send In the Clowns</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Stephen_Sondheim" title="Stephen Sondheim">Stephen Sondheim</a> (songwriter) (1976)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/I_Write_the_Songs" title="I Write the Songs">I Write the Songs</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Bruce_Johnston" title="Bruce Johnston">Bruce Johnston</a> (songwriter) (1977)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Evergreen_(Love_Theme_from_A_Star_Is_Born)" title="Evergreen (Love Theme from A Star Is Born)">Evergreen (Love Theme from A Star Is Born)</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Barbra_Streisand" title="Barbra Streisand">Barbra Streisand</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Paul_Williams_(songwriter)" title="Paul Williams (songwriter)">Paul Williams</a> (songwriters) / "<a href="/wiki/You_Light_Up_My_Life_(song)" title="You Light Up My Life (song)">You Light Up My Life</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Joseph_Brooks_(songwriter)" title="Joseph Brooks (songwriter)">Joe Brooks</a> (songwriter) (1978)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Just_the_Way_You_Are_(Billy_Joel_song)" title="Just the Way You Are (Billy Joel song)">Just the Way You Are</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Billy_Joel" title="Billy Joel">Billy Joel</a> (songwriter) (1979)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/What_a_Fool_Believes" title="What a Fool Believes">What a Fool Believes</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Kenny_Loggins" title="Kenny Loggins">Kenny Loggins</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Michael_McDonald_(musician)" title="Michael McDonald (musician)">Michael McDonald</a> (songwriters) (1980)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1981−2000</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Sailing_(Christopher_Cross_song)" title="Sailing (Christopher Cross song)">Sailing</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Christopher_Cross" title="Christopher Cross">Christopher Cross</a> (songwriter) (1981)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Bette_Davis_Eyes" title="Bette Davis Eyes">Bette Davis Eyes</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Donna_Weiss" title="Donna Weiss">Donna Weiss</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jackie_DeShannon" title="Jackie DeShannon">Jackie DeShannon</a> (songwriters) (1982)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Always_on_My_Mind" title="Always on My Mind">Always on My Mind</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Johnny_Christopher" title="Johnny Christopher">Johnny Christopher</a>, <a href="/wiki/Mark_James_(songwriter)" title="Mark James (songwriter)">Mark James</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Wayne_Carson" title="Wayne Carson">Wayne Carson</a> (songwriters) (1983)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Every_Breath_You_Take" title="Every Breath You Take">Every Breath You Take</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Sting_(musician)" title="Sting (musician)">Sting</a> (songwriter) (1984)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/What%27s_Love_Got_to_Do_with_It_(song)" title="What's Love Got to Do with It (song)">What's Love Got to Do with It</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Graham_Lyle" title="Graham Lyle">Graham Lyle</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Terry_Britten" title="Terry Britten">Terry Britten</a> (songwriters) (1985)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/We_Are_the_World" title="We Are the World">We Are the World</a>" – <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Michael Jackson</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Richie" title="Lionel Richie">Lionel Richie</a> (songwriters) (1986)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/That%27s_What_Friends_Are_For" title="That's What Friends Are For">That's What Friends Are For</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Burt_Bacharach" title="Burt Bacharach">Burt Bacharach</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Carole_Bayer_Sager" title="Carole Bayer Sager">Carole Bayer Sager</a> (songwriters) (1987)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Somewhere_Out_There_(An_American_Tail_song)" title="Somewhere Out There (An American Tail song)">Somewhere Out There</a>" – <a href="/wiki/James_Horner" title="James Horner">James Horner</a>, <a href="/wiki/Barry_Mann" title="Barry Mann">Barry Mann</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Cynthia_Weil" title="Cynthia Weil">Cynthia Weil</a> (songwriters) (1988)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Don%27t_Worry,_Be_Happy" title="Don't Worry, Be Happy">Don't Worry, Be Happy</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Bobby_McFerrin" title="Bobby McFerrin">Bobby McFerrin</a> (songwriter) (1989)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Wind_Beneath_My_Wings" title="Wind Beneath My Wings">Wind Beneath My Wings</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Larry_Henley" title="Larry Henley">Larry Henley</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jeff_Silbar" title="Jeff Silbar">Jeff Silbar</a> (songwriters) (1990)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/From_a_Distance" title="From a Distance">From a Distance</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Julie_Gold" title="Julie Gold">Julie Gold</a> (songwriter) (1991)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Unforgettable_(Nat_King_Cole_song)" title="Unforgettable (Nat King Cole song)">Unforgettable</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Irving_Gordon" title="Irving Gordon">Irving Gordon</a> (songwriter) (1992)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Tears_in_Heaven" title="Tears in Heaven">Tears in Heaven</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Eric_Clapton" title="Eric Clapton">Eric Clapton</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Will_Jennings" title="Will Jennings">Will Jennings</a> (songwriters) (1993)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/A_Whole_New_World" title="A Whole New World">A Whole New World</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Alan_Menken" title="Alan Menken">Alan Menken</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Tim_Rice" title="Tim Rice">Tim Rice</a> (songwriters) (1994)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Streets_of_Philadelphia" title="Streets of Philadelphia">Streets of Philadelphia</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Bruce_Springsteen" title="Bruce Springsteen">Bruce Springsteen</a> (songwriter) (1995)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Kiss_from_a_Rose" title="Kiss from a Rose">Kiss from a Rose</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Seal_(musician)" title="Seal (musician)">Seal</a> (songwriter) (1996)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Change_the_World" title="Change the World">Change the World</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Gordon_Kennedy_(musician)" title="Gordon Kennedy (musician)">Gordon Kennedy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Wayne_Kirkpatrick" title="Wayne Kirkpatrick">Wayne Kirkpatrick</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Tommy_Sims" title="Tommy Sims">Tommy Sims</a> (songwriters) (1997)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Sunny_Came_Home" title="Sunny Came Home">Sunny Came Home</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Shawn_Colvin" title="Shawn Colvin">Shawn Colvin</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/John_Leventhal" title="John Leventhal">John Leventhal</a> (songwriters) (1998)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/My_Heart_Will_Go_On" title="My Heart Will Go On">My Heart Will Go On</a>" – <a href="/wiki/James_Horner" title="James Horner">James Horner</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Will_Jennings" title="Will Jennings">Will Jennings</a> (songwriters) (1999)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Smooth_(Santana_song)" title="Smooth (Santana song)">Smooth</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Itaal_Shur" title="Itaal Shur">Itaal Shur</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Rob_Thomas_(musician)" title="Rob Thomas (musician)">Rob Thomas</a> (songwriters) (2000)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">2001−2020</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Beautiful_Day" title="Beautiful Day">Beautiful Day</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Adam_Clayton" title="Adam Clayton">Adam Clayton</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Edge" title="The Edge">David Evans</a>, <a href="/wiki/Larry_Mullen_Jr." title="Larry Mullen Jr.">Laurence Mullen</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Bono" title="Bono">Paul Hewson</a> (songwriters) (2001)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Fallin%27_(Alicia_Keys_song)" title="Fallin' (Alicia Keys song)">Fallin'</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Alicia_Keys" title="Alicia Keys">Alicia Keys</a> (songwriter) (2002)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Don%27t_Know_Why" title="Don't Know Why">Don't Know Why</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jesse_Harris" title="Jesse Harris">Jesse Harris</a> (songwriter) (2003)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Dance_with_My_Father_(song)" title="Dance with My Father (song)">Dance with My Father</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Richard_Marx" title="Richard Marx">Richard Marx</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Luther_Vandross" title="Luther Vandross">Luther Vandross</a> (songwriters) (2004)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Daughters_(John_Mayer_song)" title="Daughters (John Mayer song)">Daughters</a>" – <a href="/wiki/John_Mayer" title="John Mayer">John Mayer</a> (songwriter) (2005)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Sometimes_You_Can%27t_Make_It_on_Your_Own" title="Sometimes You Can't Make It on Your Own">Sometimes You Can't Make It on Your Own</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Adam_Clayton" title="Adam Clayton">Adam Clayton</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Edge" title="The Edge">David Evans</a>, <a href="/wiki/Larry_Mullen_Jr." title="Larry Mullen Jr.">Laurence Mullen</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Bono" title="Bono">Paul Hewson</a> (songwriters) (2006)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Not_Ready_to_Make_Nice" title="Not Ready to Make Nice">Not Ready to Make Nice</a>" – <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Emily_Robison" title="Emily Robison">Emily Burns Erwin</a>, <a href="/wiki/Martie_Maguire" title="Martie Maguire">Martha Maguire</a>, <a href="/wiki/Natalie_Maines" title="Natalie Maines">Natalie Maines Pasdar</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Dan_Wilson_(musician)" title="Dan Wilson (musician)">Dan Wilson</a> (songwriters) (2007)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Rehab_(Amy_Winehouse_song)" title="Rehab (Amy Winehouse song)">Rehab</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Amy_Winehouse" title="Amy Winehouse">Amy Winehouse</a> (songwriter) (2008)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Viva_la_Vida" title="Viva la Vida">Viva la Vida</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Guy_Berryman" title="Guy Berryman">Guy Berryman</a>, <a href="/wiki/Jonny_Buckland" title="Jonny Buckland">Jonathan Buckland</a>, <a href="/wiki/Will_Champion" title="Will Champion">William Champion</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Chris_Martin" title="Chris Martin">Christopher Martin</a> (songwriters) (2009)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Single_Ladies_(Put_a_Ring_on_It)" title="Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)">Single Ladies (Put a Ring on It)</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Kuk_Harrell" title="Kuk Harrell">Thaddis "Kuk" Harrell</a>, <a href="/wiki/Beyonc%C3%A9" title="Beyoncé">Beyoncé Knowles</a>, <a href="/wiki/The-Dream" title="The-Dream">Terius Nash</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Tricky_Stewart" title="Tricky Stewart">Christopher Stewart</a> (songwriters) (2010)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Need_You_Now_(Lady_Antebellum_song)" title="Need You Now (Lady Antebellum song)">Need You Now</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Dave_Haywood" title="Dave Haywood">Dave Haywood</a>, <a href="/wiki/Josh_Kear" title="Josh Kear">Josh Kear</a>, <a href="/wiki/Charles_Kelley" title="Charles Kelley">Charles Kelley</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Hillary_Scott" title="Hillary Scott">Hillary Scott</a>  (songwriters) (2011)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Rolling_in_the_Deep" title="Rolling in the Deep">Rolling in the Deep</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Adele" title="Adele">Adele Adkins</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Paul_Epworth" title="Paul Epworth">Paul Epworth</a> (songwriters) (2012)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/We_Are_Young" title="We Are Young">We Are Young</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jack_Antonoff" title="Jack Antonoff">Jack Antonoff</a>, <a href="/wiki/Jeff_Bhasker" title="Jeff Bhasker">Jeff Bhasker</a>, <a href="/wiki/Andrew_Dost" title="Andrew Dost">Andrew Dost</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Nate_Ruess" title="Nate Ruess">Nate Ruess</a> (songwriters) (2013)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Royals_(song)" title="Royals (song)">Royals</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Joel_Little" title="Joel Little">Joel Little</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lorde" title="Lorde">Ella Yelich O'Connor</a> (songwriters) (2014)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Stay_with_Me_(Sam_Smith_song)" title="Stay with Me (Sam Smith song)">Stay with Me</a>" (<a href="/wiki/Rodney_Jerkins" title="Rodney Jerkins">Darkchild</a> version) – <a href="/wiki/Jimmy_Napes" title="Jimmy Napes">James Napier</a>, <a href="/wiki/Tourist_(musician)" title="Tourist (musician)">William Phillips</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Sam_Smith" title="Sam Smith">Sam Smith</a> (songwriters) (2015)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Thinking_Out_Loud" title="Thinking Out Loud">Thinking Out Loud</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Ed_Sheeran" title="Ed Sheeran">Ed Sheeran</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Amy_Wadge" title="Amy Wadge">Amy Wadge</a> (songwriters) (2016)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Hello_(Adele_song)" title="Hello (Adele song)">Hello</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Adele" title="Adele">Adele Adkins</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Greg_Kurstin" title="Greg Kurstin">Greg Kurstin</a> (songwriters) (2017)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/That%27s_What_I_Like_(Bruno_Mars_song)" title="That's What I Like (Bruno Mars song)">That's What I Like</a>" – <a href="/wiki/1500_or_Nothin%27" title="1500 or Nothin'">Christopher Brody Brown</a>, <a href="/wiki/James_Fauntleroy" title="James Fauntleroy">James Fauntleroy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Philip_Lawrence_(songwriter)" title="Philip Lawrence (songwriter)">Philip Lawrence</a>, <a href="/wiki/Bruno_Mars" title="Bruno Mars">Bruno Mars</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Stereotypes" title="The Stereotypes">Ray Charles McCullough II, Jeremy Reeves, Ray Romulus &amp; Jonathan Yip</a> (songwriters) (2018)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/This_Is_America_(song)" title="This Is America (song)">This Is America</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Donald_Glover" title="Donald Glover">Donald Glover</a>, <a href="/wiki/Ludwig_G%C3%B6ransson" title="Ludwig Göransson">Ludwig Göransson</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Young_Thug" title="Young Thug">Jeffery Lamar Williams</a> (songwriters) (2019)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Bad_Guy_(Billie_Eilish_song)" title="Bad Guy (Billie Eilish song)">Bad Guy</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Billie_Eilish" title="Billie Eilish">Billie Eilish O'Connell</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Finneas_O%27Connell" title="Finneas O'Connell">Finneas O'Connell</a> (songwriters) (2020)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">2021−present</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/I_Can%27t_Breathe_(H.E.R._song)" title="I Can't Breathe (H.E.R. song)">I Can't Breathe</a>" – <a href="/wiki/D%27Mile" title="D'Mile">Dernst Emile II</a>, <a href="/wiki/H.E.R." title="H.E.R.">H.E.R.</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Tiara_Thomas" title="Tiara Thomas">Tiara Thomas</a> (songwriters) (2021)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Leave_the_Door_Open" title="Leave the Door Open">Leave the Door Open</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Anderson_.Paak" title="Anderson .Paak">Brandon Anderson</a>, <a href="/wiki/Brody_Brown" title="Brody Brown">Christopher Brody Brown</a>, <a href="/wiki/D%27Mile" title="D'Mile">Dernst Emile II</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Bruno_Mars" title="Bruno Mars">Bruno Mars</a> (songwriters) (2022)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Award_for_Best_Children&amp;#039;s_Album" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Award_for_Best_Children%27s_Album" title="Template:Grammy Award for Best Children's Album"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Award_for_Best_Children%27s_Album" title="Template talk:Grammy Award for Best Children's Album"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Award_for_Best_Children%27s_Album&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Award_for_Best_Children&amp;#039;s_Album" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Best_Children%27s_Album" title="Grammy Award for Best Children's Album">Grammy Award for Best Children's Album</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1959−1975</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap">"<a href="/wiki/The_Chipmunk_Song_(Christmas_Don%27t_Be_Late)" title="The Chipmunk Song (Christmas Don't Be Late)">The Chipmunk Song (Christmas Don't Be Late)</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Ross_Bagdasarian" title="Ross Bagdasarian">Ross Bagdasarian Sr.</a> (1959)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Peter_and_the_Wolf" title="Peter and the Wolf">Peter and the Wolf</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Peter_Ustinov" title="Peter Ustinov">Peter Ustinov</a> (1960)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Let%27s_All_Sing_with_The_Chipmunks" title="Let's All Sing with The Chipmunks">Let's All Sing with The Chipmunks</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Ross_Bagdasarian" title="Ross Bagdasarian">Ross Bagdasarian Sr.</a> (1961)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Peter_and_the_Wolf" title="Peter and the Wolf">Prokofiev: Peter and The Wolf</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Leonard_Bernstein" title="Leonard Bernstein">Leonard Bernstein</a> (1962)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Carnival_of_the_Animals" title="Carnival of the Animals">Saint-Saëns: Carnival of the Animals</a></i>/<i><a href="/wiki/Young_Person%27s_Guide_to_the_Orchestra" title="Young Person's Guide to the Orchestra">Britten: Young Person's Guide to the Orchestra</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Leonard_Bernstein" title="Leonard Bernstein">Leonard Bernstein</a> (1963)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>Bernstein Conducts for Young People</i> – <a href="/wiki/Leonard_Bernstein" title="Leonard Bernstein">Leonard Bernstein</a> (1964)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Mary_Poppins:_Original_Cast_Soundtrack" title="Mary Poppins: Original Cast Soundtrack">Mary Poppins: Original Cast Soundtrack</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Dick_Van_Dyke" title="Dick Van Dyke">Dick Van Dyke</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Julie_Andrews" title="Julie Andrews">Julie Andrews</a> (1965)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Dr._Seuss" title="Dr. Seuss">Dr. Seuss</a> Presents: "Fox in Sox" and "<a href="/wiki/Green_Eggs_and_Ham" title="Green Eggs and Ham">Green Eggs and Ham</a>"</i> – <a href="/wiki/Marvin_Miller_(actor)" title="Marvin Miller (actor)">Marvin Miller</a> (1966)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>Dr. Seuss Presents - "If I Ran the Zoo" and "Sleep Book"</i> – <a href="/wiki/Marvin_Miller_(actor)" title="Marvin Miller (actor)">Marvin Miller</a> (1967)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/How_the_Grinch_Stole_Christmas!_(TV_special)" title="How the Grinch Stole Christmas! (TV special)">Dr. Seuss: How The Grinch Stole Christmas</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Boris_Karloff" title="Boris Karloff">Boris Karloff</a> (1968)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap">No Award (1969)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Peter,_Paul_and_Mommy" title="Peter, Paul and Mommy">Peter, Paul and Mommy</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Peter,_Paul_and_Mary" title="Peter, Paul and Mary">Peter, Paul and Mary</a> (1970)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Sesame_Street" title="Sesame Street">Sesame Street</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Joan_Ganz_Cooney" title="Joan Ganz Cooney">Joan Cooney</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Thomas_Z._Shepard" title="Thomas Z. Shepard">Thomas Z. Shepard</a> (producers) (1971)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Bill_Cosby_Talks_to_Kids_About_Drugs" title="Bill Cosby Talks to Kids About Drugs">Bill Cosby Talks to Kids About Drugs</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Bill_Cosby" title="Bill Cosby">Bill Cosby</a> (1972)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Electric_Company" title="The Electric Company">The Electric Company</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Bill_Cosby" title="Bill Cosby">Bill Cosby</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Rita_Moreno" title="Rita Moreno">Rita Moreno</a> (1973)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Sesame_Street_discography" title="Sesame Street discography">Sesame Street Live!</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Joe_Raposo" title="Joe Raposo">Joe Raposo</a> (producer) (1974)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Winnie_the_Pooh_and_Tigger_Too" title="Winnie the Pooh and Tigger Too">Winnie the Pooh and Tigger Too</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Paul_Winchell" title="Paul Winchell">Paul Winchell</a>, <a href="/wiki/Sebastian_Cabot_(actor)" title="Sebastian Cabot (actor)">Sebastian Cabot</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Sterling_Holloway" title="Sterling Holloway">Sterling Holloway</a> (1975)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1976−1993</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><i>The Little Prince</i> – <a href="/wiki/Richard_Burton" title="Richard Burton">Richard Burton</a> (1976)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><a href="/wiki/Sergei_Prokofiev" title="Sergei Prokofiev">Prokofiev</a>: <i><a href="/wiki/Peter_and_the_Wolf" title="Peter and the Wolf">Peter and the Wolf</a></i> / <a href="/wiki/Camille_Saint-Sa%C3%ABns" title="Camille Saint-Saëns">Saint-Saëns</a>: "<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Carnival_of_the_Animals" title="Carnival of the Animals">Carnival of the Animals</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Gingold" title="Hermione Gingold">Hermione Gingold</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Karl_B%C3%B6hm" title="Karl Böhm">Karl Böhm</a> (1977)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Aren%27t_You_Glad_You%27re_You%3F_(album)" title="Aren't You Glad You're You? (album)">Aren't You Glad You're You</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Christopher_Cerf_(producer)" title="Christopher Cerf (producer)">Christopher Cerf</a> &amp; Jim Timmens (producers) (1978)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Muppet_Show_(album)" title="The Muppet Show (album)">The Muppet Show</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Jim_Henson" title="Jim Henson">Jim Henson</a> (producer) (1979)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Muppet_Movie_(soundtrack)" title="The Muppet Movie (soundtrack)">The Muppet Movie</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Jim_Henson" title="Jim Henson">Jim Henson</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Paul_Williams_(songwriter)" title="Paul Williams (songwriter)">Paul Williams</a> (producers) (1980)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/In_Harmony_(compilation_albums)" title="In Harmony (compilation albums)">In Harmony: A Sesame Street Record</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/David_Levine" title="David Levine">David Levine</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lucy_Simon" title="Lucy Simon">Lucy Simon</a> (producers) (1981)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Sesame_Street_discography" title="Sesame Street discography">Sesame Country</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Jim_Henson" title="Jim Henson">Jim Henson</a> &amp; <a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=Dennis_Scott_(record_producer)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="Dennis Scott (record producer) (page does not exist)">Dennis Scott</a> (producers) (1982)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/In_Harmony_(compilation_albums)" title="In Harmony (compilation albums)">In Harmony 2</a></i> – David Levine &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lucy_Simon" title="Lucy Simon">Lucy Simon</a> (producers) (1983)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/E.T._the_Extra-Terrestrial_(album)" title="E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial (album)">E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial</a></i> – <a class="mw-selflink selflink">Michael Jackson</a> and <a href="/wiki/Quincy_Jones" title="Quincy Jones">Quincy Jones</a> (producer) (1984)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Where_the_Sidewalk_Ends" title="Where the Sidewalk Ends">Where the Sidewalk Ends</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Shel_Silverstein" title="Shel Silverstein">Shel Silverstein</a> and Ron Haffkine (producer) (1985)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Sesame_Street_Presents:_Follow_That_Bird" title="Sesame Street Presents: Follow That Bird">Sesame Street Presents: Follow That Bird</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Jim_Henson" title="Jim Henson">Jim Henson</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Steve_Buckingham_(record_producer)" title="Steve Buckingham (record producer)">Steve Buckingham</a> (producers) (1986)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Sesame_Street_discography" title="Sesame Street discography">The Alphabet</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Jim_Henson" title="Jim Henson">Jim Henson</a>, Geri Van Rees &amp; Kathryn King (producers) (1987)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Just_So_Stories" title="Just So Stories">The Elephant's Child</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Bobby_McFerrin" title="Bobby McFerrin">Bobby McFerrin</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Jack_Nicholson" title="Jack Nicholson">Jack Nicholson</a> (1988)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Pecos_Bill" title="Pecos Bill">Pecos Bill</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Robin_Williams" title="Robin Williams">Robin Williams</a> and <a href="/wiki/Ry_Cooder" title="Ry Cooder">Ry Cooder</a> (1989)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>The Rock-A-Bye Collection, Volume 1</i> – Tanya Goodman (1990)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/The_Little_Mermaid_(soundtrack)" title="The Little Mermaid (soundtrack)">The Little Mermaid: An Original Walt Disney Records Soundtrack</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Alan_Menken" title="Alan Menken">Alan Menken</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Howard_Ashman" title="Howard Ashman">Howard Ashman</a> (songwriters) (1991)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>A Cappella Kids</i> – Clifford "Barney" Robertson (producer) (1992)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Beauty_and_the_Beast_(1991_soundtrack)" title="Beauty and the Beast (1991 soundtrack)">Beauty and the Beast: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Alan_Menken" title="Alan Menken">Alan Menken</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Howard_Ashman" title="Howard Ashman">Howard Ashman</a> (songwriters) (1993)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">2012−present</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><span class="nowrap"><i>All About Bullies... Big and Small</i> – Gloria Domina, James Cravero, Kevin Mackie, Patrick Robinson &amp; Steve Pullara (producers) (2012)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>Can You Canoe?</i> – The Okee Dokee Brothers (2013)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>Throw a Penny in the Wishing Well</i> – <a href="/wiki/Jennifer_Gasoi" title="Jennifer Gasoi">Jennifer Gasoi</a> (2014)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/I_Am_Malala" title="I Am Malala">I Am Malala: How One Girl Stood Up for Education and Changed the World</a></i> – Neela Vaswani (2015)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>Home</i> – <a href="/wiki/Tim_Kubart" title="Tim Kubart">Tim Kubart</a> (2016)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>Infinity Plus One</i> – <a href="/wiki/Secret_Agent_23_Skidoo" title="Secret Agent 23 Skidoo">Secret Agent 23 Skidoo</a> (2017)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i><a href="/wiki/Feel_What_U_Feel" title="Feel What U Feel">Feel What U Feel</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Lisa_Loeb" title="Lisa Loeb">Lisa Loeb</a> (2018)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>All the Sounds</i> – Lucy Kalantari &amp; The Jazz Cats (2019)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>Ageless Songs for the Child Archetype</i> – Jon Samson (2020)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>All the Ladies</i> – <a href="/wiki/Joanie_Leeds" title="Joanie Leeds">Joanie Leeds</a> (2021)</span></li>
<li><span class="nowrap"><i>A Colorful World</i> − <a href="/wiki/Falu" title="Falu">Falu</a> (2022)</span></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><td class="navbox-abovebelow" colspan="2" style="background:#cedff2;"><div>From 1994–2011, the category was split into <a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Best_Musical_Album_for_Children" title="Grammy Award for Best Musical Album for Children">Best Musical Album for Children</a> and <a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Best_Spoken_Word_Album_for_Children" title="Grammy Award for Best Spoken Word Album for Children">Best Spoken Word Album for Children</a>.</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Award_for_Best_Male_Pop_Vocal_Performance" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Award_for_Best_Male_Pop_Vocal_Performance" title="Template:Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Award_for_Best_Male_Pop_Vocal_Performance" title="Template talk:Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Award_for_Best_Male_Pop_Vocal_Performance&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Award_for_Best_Male_Pop_Vocal_Performance" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Best_Male_Pop_Vocal_Performance" title="Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance">Grammy Award for Best Male Pop Vocal Performance</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1950s</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Catch_a_Falling_Star" title="Catch a Falling Star">Catch a Falling Star</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Perry_Como" title="Perry Como">Perry Como</a> (1959)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1960s</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><i><a href="/wiki/Come_Dance_with_Me!_(album)" title="Come Dance with Me! (album)">Come Dance with Me!</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sinatra" title="Frank Sinatra">Frank Sinatra</a> (1960)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Georgia_on_My_Mind" title="Georgia on My Mind">Georgia on My Mind</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Ray_Charles" title="Ray Charles">Ray Charles</a> / <i><a href="/wiki/The_Genius_of_Ray_Charles" title="The Genius of Ray Charles">The Genius of Ray Charles</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Ray_Charles" title="Ray Charles">Ray Charles</a> (1961)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Lollipops_and_Roses_(song)" title="Lollipops and Roses (song)">Lollipops and Roses</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jack_Jones_(American_singer)" title="Jack Jones (American singer)">Jack Jones</a> (1962)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/I_Left_My_Heart_in_San_Francisco" title="I Left My Heart in San Francisco">I Left My Heart in San Francisco</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Tony_Bennett" title="Tony Bennett">Tony Bennett</a> (1963)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Wives_and_Lovers" title="Wives and Lovers">Wives and Lovers</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jack_Jones_(American_singer)" title="Jack Jones (American singer)">Jack Jones</a> (1964)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Hello,_Dolly!_(song)" title="Hello, Dolly! (song)">Hello, Dolly!</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Louis_Armstrong" title="Louis Armstrong">Louis Armstrong</a> (1965)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/It_Was_a_Very_Good_Year" title="It Was a Very Good Year">It Was a Very Good Year</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sinatra" title="Frank Sinatra">Frank Sinatra</a> (1966)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Strangers_in_the_Night" title="Strangers in the Night">Strangers in the Night</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sinatra" title="Frank Sinatra">Frank Sinatra</a> (1967)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/By_the_Time_I_Get_to_Phoenix" title="By the Time I Get to Phoenix">By the Time I Get to Phoenix</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Glen_Campbell" title="Glen Campbell">Glen Campbell</a> (1968)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Light_My_Fire#Jos.C3.A9_Feliciano_cover" title="Light My Fire">Light My Fire</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Jos%C3%A9_Feliciano" title="José Feliciano">José Feliciano</a> (1969)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1970s</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li>"<a href="/wiki/Everybody%27s_Talkin%27" title="Everybody's Talkin'">Everybody's Talkin'</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Harry_Nilsson" title="Harry Nilsson">Harry Nilsson</a> (1970)</li>
<li>"<a href="/wiki/Everything_Is_Beautiful" title="Everything Is Beautiful">Everything Is Beautiful</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Ray_Stevens" title="Ray Stevens">Ray Stevens</a> (1971)</li>

<li>"<a href="/wiki/You_Are_the_Sunshine_of_My_Life" title="You Are the Sunshine of My Life">You Are the Sunshine of My Life</a>" – <a href="/wiki/Stevie_Wonder" title="Stevie Wonder">Stevie Wonder</a> (1974)</li>
<li><i><a href="/wiki/Fulfillingness%27_First_Finale" title="Fulfillingness' First Finale">Fulfillingness' First Finale</a></i> – <a href="/wiki/Stevie_Wonder" title="Stevie Wonder">Stevie Wonder</a> (1975)</li>

</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1980s</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Award_for_Producer_of_the_Year,_Non-Classical" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Award_for_Producer_of_the_Year,_Non-Classical" title="Template:Grammy Award for Producer of the Year, Non-Classical"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Award_for_Producer_of_the_Year,_Non-Classical" title="Template talk:Grammy Award for Producer of the Year, Non-Classical"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Award_for_Producer_of_the_Year,_Non-Classical&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Award_for_Producer_of_the_Year,_Non-Classical" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Award_for_Producer_of_the_Year,_Non-Classical" title="Grammy Award for Producer of the Year, Non-Classical">Grammy Award for Producer of the Year, Non-Classical</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1975−2000</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Thom_Bell" title="Thom Bell">Thom Bell</a> (1975)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Arif_Mardin" title="Arif Mardin">Arif Mardin</a> (1976)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Stevie_Wonder" title="Stevie Wonder">Stevie Wonder</a> (1977)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Peter_Asher" title="Peter Asher">Peter Asher</a> (1978)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Bee_Gees" title="Bee Gees">Bee Gees</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albhy_Galuten" title="Albhy Galuten">Albhy Galuten</a> &amp; Karl Richardson (1979)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Larry_Butler_(producer)" title="Larry Butler (producer)">Larry Butler</a> (1980)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Phil_Ramone" title="Phil Ramone">Phil Ramone</a> (1981)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Quincy_Jones" title="Quincy Jones">Quincy Jones</a> (1982)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Toto_(band)" title="Toto (band)">Toto</a> (1983)</li>
<li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Michael Jackson</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Quincy_Jones" title="Quincy Jones">Quincy Jones</a> (1984)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/James_Anthony_Carmichael" title="James Anthony Carmichael">James Anthony Carmichael</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Lionel_Richie" title="Lionel Richie">Lionel Richie</a> / <a href="/wiki/David_Foster" title="David Foster">David Foster</a> (1985)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Phil_Collins" title="Phil Collins">Phil Collins</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Hugh_Padgham" title="Hugh Padgham">Hugh Padgham</a> (1986)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Jimmy_Jam_and_Terry_Lewis" title="Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis">Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis</a> (1987)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Narada_Michael_Walden" title="Narada Michael Walden">Narada Michael Walden</a> (1988)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Neil_Dorfsman" title="Neil Dorfsman">Neil Dorfsman</a> (1989)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Peter_Asher" title="Peter Asher">Peter Asher</a> (1990)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Quincy_Jones" title="Quincy Jones">Quincy Jones</a> (1991)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/David_Foster" title="David Foster">David Foster</a> (1992)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Brian_Eno" title="Brian Eno">Brian Eno</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Daniel_Lanois" title="Daniel Lanois">Daniel Lanois</a> / <a href="/wiki/L.A._Reid" title="L.A. Reid">L.A. Reid</a> &amp; <a href="/wiki/Babyface_(musician)" title="Babyface (musician)">Babyface</a> (1993)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/David_Foster" title="David Foster">David Foster</a> (1994)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Don_Was" title="Don Was">Don Was</a> (1995)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Babyface_(musician)" title="Babyface (musician)">Babyface</a> (1996)</li>

<li><a href="/wiki/Walter_Afanasieff" title="Walter Afanasieff">Walter Afanasieff</a> (2000)</li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">2001−present</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Legend_Award" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Legend_Award" title="Template:Grammy Legend Award"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Legend_Award" title="Template talk:Grammy Legend Award"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Legend_Award&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Legend_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Legend_Award" title="Grammy Legend Award">Grammy Legend Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Andrew_Lloyd_Webber" title="Andrew Lloyd Webber">Andrew Lloyd Webber</a> / <a href="/wiki/Liza_Minnelli" title="Liza Minnelli">Liza Minnelli</a> / <a href="/wiki/Willie_Nelson" title="Willie Nelson">Willie Nelson</a> / <a href="/wiki/Smokey_Robinson" title="Smokey Robinson">Smokey Robinson</a> (<a href="/wiki/32nd_Annual_Grammy_Awards" title="32nd Annual Grammy Awards">1990</a>)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Johnny_Cash" title="Johnny Cash">Johnny Cash</a> / <a href="/wiki/Aretha_Franklin" title="Aretha Franklin">Aretha Franklin</a> / <a href="/wiki/Billy_Joel" title="Billy Joel">Billy Joel</a> / <a href="/wiki/Quincy_Jones" title="Quincy Jones">Quincy Jones</a> (<a href="/wiki/33rd_Annual_Grammy_Awards" title="33rd Annual Grammy Awards">1991</a>)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Barbra_Streisand" title="Barbra Streisand">Barbra Streisand</a> (<a href="/wiki/34th_Annual_Grammy_Awards" title="34th Annual Grammy Awards">1992</a>)</li>
<li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Michael Jackson</a> (<a href="/wiki/35th_Annual_Grammy_Awards" title="35th Annual Grammy Awards">1993</a>)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Curtis_Mayfield" title="Curtis Mayfield">Curtis Mayfield</a> / <a href="/wiki/Frank_Sinatra" title="Frank Sinatra">Frank Sinatra</a> (<a href="/wiki/36th_Annual_Grammy_Awards" title="36th Annual Grammy Awards">1994</a>)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Luciano_Pavarotti" title="Luciano Pavarotti">Luciano Pavarotti</a> (<a href="/wiki/40th_Annual_Grammy_Awards" title="40th Annual Grammy Awards">1998</a>)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Elton_John" title="Elton John">Elton John</a> (<a href="/wiki/41st_Annual_Grammy_Awards" title="41st Annual Grammy Awards">1999</a>)</li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Grammy_Lifetime_Achievement_Award" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible mw-collapsed navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:Grammy_Lifetime_Achievement_Award" title="Template:Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:Grammy_Lifetime_Achievement_Award" title="Template talk:Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:Grammy_Lifetime_Achievement_Award&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Grammy_Lifetime_Achievement_Award" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Grammy_Lifetime_Achievement_Award" title="Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award">Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="background:#cedff2;;width:1%">1963–1990</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<li>2007

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="MTV_Europe_Music_Award_for_Best_Male" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:MTV_Europe_Music_Award_for_Best_Male" title="Template:MTV Europe Music Award for Best Male"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:MTV_Europe_Music_Award_for_Best_Male" title="Template talk:MTV Europe Music Award for Best Male"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:MTV_Europe_Music_Award_for_Best_Male&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="MTV_Europe_Music_Award_for_Best_Male" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/MTV_Europe_Music_Award_for_Best_Male" title="MTV Europe Music Award for Best Male">MTV Europe Music Award for Best Male</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="MTV_Video_Music_Award_for_Best_Choreography" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks hlist mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col" style="background:#cedff2;"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:MTV_Video_Music_Award_for_Best_Choreography" title="Template:MTV Video Music Award for Best Choreography"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:MTV_Video_Music_Award_for_Best_Choreography" title="Template talk:MTV Video Music Award for Best Choreography"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:MTV_Video_Music_Award_for_Best_Choreography&amp;action=edit"><abbr style="background:#cedff2;;;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="MTV_Video_Music_Award_for_Best_Choreography" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/MTV_Video_Music_Award_for_Best_Choreography" title="MTV Video Music Award for Best Choreography">MTV Video Music Award for Best Choreography</a></div></th></tr><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-odd" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a class="mw-selflink selflink">Michael Jackson</a> and <a href="/wiki/Michael_Peters_(choreographer)" title="Michael Peters (choreographer)">Michael Peters</a> (1984)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/David_Atkins" title="David Atkins">David Atkins</a> (1985)</li>
<li><a href="/wiki/Prince_(musician)" title="Prince (musician)">Prince</a> (1986)</li>

<div class="navbox-styles nomobile"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1061467846" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/></div><div aria-labelledby="Rock_and_Roll_Hall_of_Fame_–_Class_of_1997" class="navbox" role="navigation" style="padding:3px"><table class="nowraplinks mw-collapsible autocollapse navbox-inner" style="border-spacing:0;background:transparent;color:inherit"><tbody><tr><th class="navbox-title" colspan="2" scope="col"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1063604349" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><div class="navbar plainlinks hlist navbar-mini"><ul><li class="nv-view"><a href="/wiki/Template:1997_Rock_and_Roll_Hall_of_Fame" title="Template:1997 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="View this template">v</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-talk"><a href="/wiki/Template_talk:1997_Rock_and_Roll_Hall_of_Fame" title="Template talk:1997 Rock and Roll Hall of Fame"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Discuss this template">t</abbr></a></li><li class="nv-edit"><a class="external text" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Template:1997_Rock_and_Roll_Hall_of_Fame&amp;action=edit"><abbr style=";;background:none transparent;border:none;box-shadow:none;padding:0;" title="Edit this template">e</abbr></a></li></ul></div><div id="Rock_and_Roll_Hall_of_Fame_–_Class_of_1997" style="font-size:114%;margin:0 4em"><a href="/wiki/Rock_and_Roll_Hall_of_Fame" title="Rock and Roll Hall of Fame">Rock and Roll Hall of Fame</a> – <a href="/wiki/List_of_Rock_and_Roll_Hall_of_Fame_inductees" title="List of Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductees">Class of 1997</a></div></th></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%">Performers</th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd hlist" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><b><a href="/wiki/Bee_Gees" title="Bee Gees">Bee Gees</a></b>
